title: Old Aatrox auto atacking and healing is unfun to play against...but mundo is fine?
body:
I mean, at least Aatrox had to auto attack to heal.

Mundo has a kit that allows him to do well with {{item:3065}} {{item:3083}} early, allowing him to always be healing, then pressing R to heal even more. Its so FUN to watch a champion get all of his health back after he runs away from the fight for a few seconds....WHILE doing great damage and being great in team fights for his team.

But ya know, AATROX was the problem. 

Fucking JOKE.

replies.body: Mundo is on the VGU list you clown. Obviously he isn't in an acceptable place for Riot.

Great, and then what next? Today sustain is the bad guy, tomorrow....all the damage they are letting champs do now? Then they will have to fix that? Its a cluster fuck. Riot is a joke.  They eliminate diversity of playstyles...for what reason?

I don't understand why people go "X got reworked but Y is okay?" Complete reworks take time and resources, and they're not going to roll them all at once (on top of being, well, impossible). There's a roadmap for a reason, and a **lot** of older champions that need tuning as well. 

After Akali and Nunu, my bet is Mundo is probably going to be one of the next three precisely for the reasons you speak of.
He shouldnt. He should be what he is and tone down his damage perhaps. Riot wants to destroy any diversity of champions or game play. Everyone spams damage now. Fuck them.

Because, now it this, tomorrow its that. The entire game changes based on probably the decision of one person.

Sustain is not okay, but everyone doing insane damage is. And then someday they will say, insane damage is not okay...

Its a ridiculous cluster fuck at Riot. You give them credit, but they really have no idea what they are doing.

To be fair, it's *more* healthy that Mundo doesn't do a butt-ton of damage *while* he heals that much. Aatrox got to build full damage (potentially, I realize that's not most games) and still be impossible to kill. It's not exactly the same as Mundo, who at least has to build tank for that.

Mundo can be kited and dealt with rather easily. Is his ult powerful? Yes, but that's because it's his only real initiation tool beyond smacking you with cleavers.

If you're going to complain about ANYTHING on Mundo, it should be those damn 25% HP cleavers. God damn those hit like a brick.

Not to mention he goes full tank 0 dmg items and pumps out 280 base dmg cleavers up the ass
and out damages bruisers. Really a delightful experience to lane vs one xD
Mundo was trash tier until the "you dont have to play league to balance it" decided to buff his ult.
